member.name: D2D1_BLEND
member.summary: Specifies how one of the color sources is to be derived and optionally specifies a preblend operation on the color source.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND.D2D1_BLEND_ZERO
member.summary: The data source is black (0, 0, 0, 0). There is no preblend operation.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND.D2D1_BLEND_ONE
member.summary: The data source is white (1, 1, 1, 1). There is no preblend operation.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND.D2D1_BLEND_SRC_COLOR
member.summary: The data source is color data (RGB) from the second input of the blend transform. There is not a preblend operation.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND.D2D1_BLEND_INV_SRC_COLOR
member.summary: The data source is color data (RGB) from second input of the blend transform. The preblend operation inverts the data, generating 1 - RGB.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND.D2D1_BLEND_SRC_ALPHA
member.summary: The data source is alpha data (A) from second input of the blend transform. There is no preblend operation.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND.D2D1_BLEND_INV_SRC_ALPHA
member.summary: The data source is alpha data (A) from the second input of the blend transform. The preblend operation inverts the data, generating 1 - A.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND.D2D1_BLEND_DEST_ALPHA
member.summary: The data source is alpha data (A) from the first input of the blend transform. There is no preblend operation.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND.D2D1_BLEND_INV_DEST_ALPHA
member.summary: The data source is alpha data (A) from the first input of the blend transform. The preblend operation inverts the data, generating 1 - A.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND.D2D1_BLEND_DEST_COLOR
member.summary: The data source is color data from the first input of the blend transform. There is no preblend operation.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND.D2D1_BLEND_INV_DEST_COLOR
member.summary: The data source is color data from the first input of the blend transform. The preblend operation inverts the data, generating 1 - RGB.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND.D2D1_BLEND_SRC_ALPHA_SAT
member.summary: The data source is alpha data from the second input of the blend transform. The preblend operation clamps the data to 1 or less.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND.D2D1_BLEND_BLEND_FACTOR
member.summary: The data source is the blend factor. There is no preblend operation.

member.name: D2D1_BLEND.D2D1_BLEND_INV_BLEND_FACTOR
member.summary: The data source is the blend factor. The preblend operation inverts the blend factor, generating 1 - blend_factor.
